Dhajadāyaka Thera：1．Dhajadāyaka Thera.-An arahant．He set up a standard at the foot of Padumuttara’s Bodhi-tree and swept the ground around it．He was once a king named IIggata，and again a king named Megha （Ap.i.108f）.



2．Dhajadāyaka Thera.-An arahant．Ninety-two kappas ago he saw Tissa Buddha and set up a flag in his honour （Ap.i.277f）.
